page.title: 18FOOD AND DIET
page.content: For breakfast I had three sausages in bread with tomato sauce and a cup of tea. For dinner I had a salad containing lettuce, tomato, luncheon meat, cheese, cress and salad cream, then an oatmeal biscuit and a cup of Ribena. For tea I had cheese on toast, strawberries (tinned), cheese biscuits, ice-pop and a glass of lemonade. My diet is usually full of natural foods except for sausages, my drinks are also natural except for fizzy drinks. I am not a vegetarian but I will only eat certain meats because I don't like the idea of animals being fattened up to be killed for us to eat. So I hope that one day people will realise that it is bad to kill animals just to eat them and then they will stop it.
